title: League of Legends GO.
body:
It's an original idea. You walk around and collect champions.

Each champion you get drops a shard and you combine 20 shards to unlock the champion permanently.

get on it Riot. Pokemon got me outta the house, but for only 9 hours of the day. Imagine if I had two things to collect on the go?

replies.body: i dont think riot will make this, as it would take AGES to make and it will take away time from working on League
get gemstones at tencentstops for half price! (rrp $500)
